019package org.apache.shiro.web.env;
020
021import org.apache.shiro.env.Environment;
022import org.apache.shiro.web.config.ShiroFilterConfiguration;
023import org.apache.shiro.web.filter.mgt.FilterChainResolver;
024import org.apache.shiro.web.mgt.WebSecurityManager;
025
026import javax.servlet.ServletContext;
027
028/**
029 * A web-specific {@link Environment} instance, used in web applications.
030 *
031 * @since 1.2
032 */
033public interface WebEnvironment extends Environment {
034
035    /**
036     * Returns the web application's {@code FilterChainResolver} if one has been configured or {@code null} if one
037     * is not available.
038     *
039     * @return the web application's {@code FilterChainResolver} if one has been configured or {@code null} if one
040     *         is not available.
041     */
042    FilterChainResolver getFilterChainResolver();
043
044    /**
045     * Returns the {@code ServletContext} associated with this {@code WebEnvironment} instance.  A web application
046     * typically only has a single {@code WebEnvironment} associated with its {@code ServletContext}.
047     *
048     * @return the {@code ServletContext} associated with this {@code WebEnvironment} instance.
049     */
050    ServletContext getServletContext();
051
052    /**
053     * Returns the web application's security manager instance.
054     *
055     * @return the web application's security manager instance.
056     */
057    WebSecurityManager getWebSecurityManager();
058
059
060    /**
061     * Returns the configuration object used to configure the ShiroFilter.
062     *
063     * @return the configuration object used to configure the ShiroFilter.
064     */
065    default ShiroFilterConfiguration getShiroFilterConfiguration() {
066        return new ShiroFilterConfiguration();
067    }
068}
